fields.value: Replication data for: "Keep the Kids Inside? Juvenile Curfews and Urban Gun Violence"

dsDescriptionValue.value: Carr, Jillian B., and Doleac, Jennifer L., (2018) “Keep the Kids Inside? Juvenile Curfews and Urban Gun Violence.” Review of Economics and Statistics 100:4, 609-618.

files.description: This STATA .dta file was generated by bringing the original 911 call data into ArcMap, mapping it, matching the calls to the Police Service Area (PSA) in which it occurred, outputting the result, and then saving it as a STATA file. (source: Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police)
files.label: calls911_psatract.tab

dataFile.description: This STATA .dta file was generated by bringing the original 911 call data into ArcMap, mapping it, matching the calls to the Police Service Area (PSA) in which it occurred, outputting the result, and then saving it as a STATA file. (source: Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police)

files.description: This STATA .dta file contains incident-level crime reports from 2011 obtained from the Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police. This dataset contains the Police Service Area (PSA), so it did not need to be processed using ArcMap. (source: Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police)
files.label: dccrime_2011.tab

dataFile.description: This STATA .dta file contains incident-level crime reports from 2011 obtained from the Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police. This dataset contains the Police Service Area (PSA), so it did not need to be processed using ArcMap. (source: Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police)

files.description: This STATA .dta file contains incident-level crime reports from 2012 obtained from the Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police. This dataset contains the Police Service Area (PSA), so it did not need to be processed using ArcMap. (source: Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police)
files.label: dccrime_2012.tab

dataFile.description: This STATA .dta file contains incident-level crime reports from 2012 obtained from the Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police. This dataset contains the Police Service Area (PSA), so it did not need to be processed using ArcMap. (source: Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police)

files.description: This STATA .dta file contains incident-level crime reports from 2013 obtained from the Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police. This dataset contains the Police Service Area (PSA), so it did not need to be processed using ArcMap. (source: Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police)
files.label: dccrime_2013.tab

dataFile.description: This STATA .dta file contains incident-level crime reports from 2013 obtained from the Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police. This dataset contains the Police Service Area (PSA), so it did not need to be processed using ArcMap. (source: Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police)

files.description: This STATA dataset is "empty" in that it contains an observation for each PSA on each day in the study period. Other datasets are merged onto it. (source: author's construction)
files.label: empty_panel.dta

dataFile.description: This STATA dataset is "empty" in that it contains an observation for each PSA on each day in the study period. Other datasets are merged onto it. (source: author's construction)

files.description: This LaTeX file takes the figures and tables created by the "replicate_results.do" file and places them neatly into a pdf.
files.label: figuresandtables.tex

dataFile.description: This LaTeX file takes the figures and tables created by the "replicate_results.do" file and places them neatly into a pdf.

files.description: Main panel used to generate tables and figures. Generated (and replaced) by "make_panel.do"
files.label: hourlypanel.dta

dataFile.description: Main panel used to generate tables and figures. Generated (and replaced) by "make_panel.do"

files.description: This STATA .do file takes the original data and converts it into an hourly panel of gunshots.
files.label: make_panel.do

dataFile.description: This STATA .do file takes the original data and converts it into an hourly panel of gunshots.

files.description: This .txt file was generated by bringing the original ShotSpotter data into ArcMap, mapping it, matching the gunshots to the Police Service Area (PSA) in which it occurred, and outputting the result. (source: Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police, author's mapping)
files.label: psa_ss_inc_join.txt

dataFile.description: This .txt file was generated by bringing the original ShotSpotter data into ArcMap, mapping it, matching the gunshots to the Police Service Area (PSA) in which it occurred, and outputting the result. (source: Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police, author's mapping)

files.description: This STATA dataset contains hourly rain totals as reported at Washington Reagan Airport. (source: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration)
files.label: rain_hourly.tab

dataFile.description: This STATA dataset contains hourly rain totals as reported at Washington Reagan Airport. (source: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration)

files.description: This STATA .do file uses the hourly gunshot and crime panel created in "make_panel.do" to replicate all of the tables and figures in the paper.
files.label: replicate_results.do

dataFile.description: This STATA .do file uses the hourly gunshot and crime panel created in "make_panel.do" to replicate all of the tables and figures in the paper.

files.description: This STATA .dta file contains the original ShotSpotter data obtained from the Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police. (source: Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police)
files.label: sst_incidents.tab

dataFile.description: This STATA .dta file contains the original ShotSpotter data obtained from the Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police. (source: Washington D.C. Metropolitan Police)

files.description: This STATA dataset contains daily high and low temperatures and liquid precipitation totals as reported at Washington Reagan Airport. (source: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration)
files.label: weather.tab

dataFile.description: This STATA dataset contains daily high and low temperatures and liquid precipitation totals as reported at Washington Reagan Airport. (source: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration)
